ranking.themetenpts: Number of themes with more than 10 points
ranking.themetwentypts: Number of themes with more than 20 points

rules.step2: Select a game mode (Solo, Duel, Duel against friends, Training)
rules.step3: Answer the questions within the time limit!

mode1.title: Solo
mode1.goal: The objective is to make the largest series of correct answers in a row on the selected theme.
mode1.explain: The questions follow one another for you to answer within the time limit, one wrong answer and it's the end of the game.

mode2.title: Duel
mode2.goal: The objective is to make more points than your opponent.
mode2.explain: You will have 5 questions with a time limit to answer them.

mode3.title: Duel against friends
mode3.goal: The objective is to make more points than your friend.
mode3.explain: You will have 5 questions with a time limit to answer them.

mode4.title: Training
mode4.explain: You follow the questions without time limit regardless of whether you answer wrong or right.

warning.warning1: You can play without logging in, but your scores will not be saved.

question1.title: How do I install the application?
question1.explain: To install the application on Phone, Tablet or PC click on this <anchor>{{link}}</anchor>

question3.title: How do I add a friend?
question3.explain: Go to the Players page (<anchor>{{link}}</anchor>), then click on the avatar of the player you want to add.

question4.title: How to delete a friend?
question4.explain: Go to the Players page (<anchor>{{link}}</anchor>), then click on the avatar of the player you want to add.

question5.title: How do I add a theme?

question6.title: How do I add a question?

question7.title: How do I report a problem?
question7.explain: At the end of a game you can report a question via the Report button. <anchor>{{link}}</anchor>)

installation.android2: Available on Google Play via the link below
installation.apple1: At the address bar, tap Share.
installation.apple2: Find the Add to Home Screen option, then tap it.

rules1.title: Article 1 - Account in the application
rules1.text: The user creating an account on the application has the possibility of accessing it by logging in using the identifiers provided during registration. The user is entirely responsible for protecting the password he has chosen.

rules2.title: Article 2 - Exemption from liability of the publisher in the context of the execution of this contract
rules2.text: In the event of impossibility of access to the application, due to technical problems or of any nature, the user will not be able to claim damage and will not be able to claim any compensation.

rules3.title: Article 3 - Access to the application by Internet connection
rules3.text: The publisher cannot be held liable due to technical unavailability of the connection, whether due in particular to a case of force majeure, maintenance, an update, a modification, an intervention by the host, an internal or external strike, a network electrical failure, a power cut, or even a poor configuration or use of the user's device.

rules4.title: Article 4 - Account closure
rules4.text: Each user is free to close their account on the application.

rules5.title: Article 5 - Applicable law and mediation
rules5.text: These general conditions are subject to the application of French law.

rules1.title: Introduction and role of the charter
rules1.text: This charter aims to inform you of the application's commitments with regard to respect for your private life and the protection of personal data concerning you, collected and processed during your use of the application.

rules2.title: Personal data
rules2.text: QuizBattle collects your email address and password if you create an account in order to authenticate you, but this remains confidential and is not displayed to other users.

rules3.title: Data saved
rules3.text: QuizBattle saves all the results of your Solo and Duel games in order to display your statistics on your profile and calculate your ranking.

rules4.title: Purchases
rules4.text: QuizBattle is 100% free and requires no online purchases.

rules5.title: Contact
rules5.text: For any complaints, questions or ideas, you can use the following email address: support@quizbattle.fr

sort.gamessolo: Sort by number of Solo games
sort.gamesduel: Sort by number of Duel games
sort.scoresolo: Sort by best score in Solo game
sort.scoreduel: Sort by best ranking in Duel game

tutorial.title: Welcome to QuizBattle
tutorial.explain: QuizBattle is a quiz game allowing you to test your knowledge on a multitude of themes thanks to 3 fun and free game modes.

share.title: Quizbattle
share.score: Join Quizbattle and beat my score {{score}} on the theme {{theme}}.
share.text: Join Quizbattle and come challenge me on a multitude of themes.
